author: ggregory
msg: Moved package private class CharsetEncodingNames to the main package under the name RequiredCharsetNames. "Charset" reflects the name used in the JRE instead of "encoding". Updated string literals for required charset names ("UTF-8", "US-ASCII", etc) with references to new class static constants. Also created the new class StringBytesUtils (need a better name?) to wrap calls to String#getBytes(String) and String#String(byte[],String) for required charset names, such that it is not required for call sites to catch or re-throw UnsupportedEncodingException since Java requires 6 charsets to be present.
